title.bibl: Revyen, Apr. 22, 1905. [The Hans Christian Andersen Jubilee]

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

div.bibl: Revyen, Apr. 22, 1905. [THE HANS CHRISTIAN ANDERSEN JUBILEE]

body.p: The financial result of the Hans Christian Andersen Jubilee for the benefit of the Danish Children's Home is estimated to be about $6,000. At the present moment $2,302.13 has already been paid in. The Home already has $4,000, and as the Home will cost $15,000, there will still be four or five thousand dollars to raise if the new Home is to be free from debt. The committee decided to rest for a while before an attempt was made to raise the last few thousand dollars.
